Scritpics | Distributed Computing

Service

Distributed Computing

Robust and seamless solutions that stand the test of time across distributed geographies.

Technology has broken down the barriers of distance and time zones. In addition to it, Distributed Computing has taken it a step further by bringing together numerous software parts that are spread across different systems to run as a single system, brought together by a single common component. With everything related to technology becoming intangible and software driven, all operations that can be shifted to software are being transitioned.

We, at Scriptics, have adopted Distributed Computing to make the ease of a single system come true. We cater to all existing configurations – Individual Computers, Workstations, mainframes etc and convert them all to work as a single computer.

We organize the software by bifurcating it into clients and servers. The intention is to ensure that all parts are connected and are not only able to transfer messages but also speak to each other. The added advantage of increased availability of applications adds to the existing bunch. We provide you the option of adding more systems to the network as and when required to ensure that lag or delayed communication isn’t the barrier to increasing operations.

We aim at integrating multiple data sources and ensure storage, processing and increase of capacity through Distributed Computing.

Some of the benefits we provide through distributed computing are as follows –

Sharing of resources

Detection of errors and quick recovery

Access control

We provide the resources for parallel or simultaneous processing of data.

We give you the advantage of Scalability, quick and easy expansion and reduce and eradicate any kind of redundancy.

CAPABILITIES

Network – Usually LAN or Internet-based. Is also the oldest form of technological communication

Cellular Networks – With the continuous advancement in cellular demand, the complexity of Cellular Networks keeps increasing by the day

Real-Time Systems – There is literally no sphere of operations in today’s day and age wherein Real-Time Systems don’t exist, Transportation, Manufacturing is big on its usage

Data Base Systems – Makes it easier to manage data across locations, time zones and data systems

Streamline business processes across diverse departments including sales, department, marketing, etc.
